games.title: On Call
games.description: Wake up in time! The first installment in the Original Anton saga!

games.title: SpeedSkii
games.description: Get ready for a downhill adventure unlike anything else! Based on the Vic-20 game with the same name.

games.description: Battle for humanity, defeat the AI in this advanced game of chance and skill that is as old as the human hand.

games.title: F-ONE
games.description: Satisfy your need for speed, fine-tune your reflexes  and dominate the racetrack in this high-octane sports game revolving around circuit driving!

games.title: REfuel
games.description:
One mans struggle against in the world to reach balance! Experience this second installment in the Original Anton saga!
A game of patience and precision.

games.title: Jump the Goat
games.description: The ancient tradition of jumping on goats is realized in this classic turnbased goat-jump-RTS-rouglike-lite. GOATY edition.

games.title: No Sleep
games.description: The struggle is real! The struggle to to do whatever it takes to keep your focus and stay awake! For some reason.

games.title: Stack The Heap
games.description: Hack the past, command the future, controll the RAM and STACK the HEAP!

games.title: Space Race
games.description: Rase the stakes, break the limits and and claim victory!

games.description: Rescue the cats from the trees and bring them to safety! A game of skill and precision!
